fields.label: Google Tag Manager
fields.name: google_tag_manager

fields.label: Schema
fields.name: schema
fields.instructions:
Paste in your Structured Data from Schema.org

Example:
<script type="application/ld+json">{
  "@context": "https://schema.org/",
  "@type": "CreativeWorkSeries",
  "name": "Attorney Law Office",
  "aggregateRating": {
    "@type": "AggregateRating",
    "ratingValue": "5",
    "bestRating": "5",
    "ratingCount": "114"
  }
}
</script>
